title: Beta Client Application has stopped working.
body:
So basically my Computer crashed when the client restarted for the maintenance, and when this occured the Shortcut for the League of Legends Beta has broken, and so has the actual Application for the Beta, i can still start up the leagcy client, but now there is no way to get onto the Beta client, as no installers exist (as it's done in client).

What do i do in this scenario?

replies.body: And now even the legacy client has stopped working, fun times.
